## Changes

### Strategic Architecture
- AGENTS.md: Added Dev Server definition (section 3.3.2)

- Clear separation: Wizard v1.1 (frozen), Dev v0.x (unstable)
- Port assignments: 8765 (Wizard), 8766 (Dev)

### Documentation

### uMarkdown Mac App (`/app`)
- Upgraded to Svelte 4.2.0 + Tailwind CSS 3.4.1
- New build pipeline:
  - tailwind.config.js: Brand colors, typography
  - postcss.config.js: CSS processing
  - vite.config.ts: Svelte plugin integration

- UI Components (Svelte):
  - src/App.svelte: Root layout (header, sidebar, split-pane editor/preview)
  - src/components/BinderNav.svelte: Recursive tree navigation
  - src/components/MarkdownEditor.svelte: Editor with toolbar
  - src/components/Preview.svelte: Live markdown rendering

- Entry point:
  - index.html: Clean Svelte app shell
  - src/main.ts: Svelte initialization

- Complete development guide (app/README.md)

### Dev Server (Experimental)
- `wizard/dev_server.py`: Complete FastAPI implementation
  - TS runtime endpoints (/api/v0/runtime/*)
  - Task scheduling endpoints (/api/v0/tasks/*)
  - Binder compilation endpoints (/api/v0/binder/*)
  - Health check + service status

- Service stubs (ready for implementation):
  - wizard/services/dev/runtime_executor.py
  - wizard/services/dev/task_scheduler.py
  - wizard/services/dev/binder_compiler.py

- Shared utilities:
  - wizard/services/shared/__init__.py

### Configuration
- wizard/config/init_dev_config.py: Dev config helper
- Dev config (local-only, gitignored): wizard/config/dev.json

## Architecture

```
uDOS v1.0.2.0
├── Core (Python TUI) — Unchanged
├── Wizard Server (v1.1.0.0, port 8765) — Production-only, frozen
├── Dev Server (v0.1.0, port 8766) — Experimental, unstable
└── uMarkdown App (Tauri+Svelte) — Local-first binder, tasks
```
